Name: Pineapple & Cardamom 'Martini'
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Review: Pineapple and cardamon are a spectacular pairing of fruit and spice in this vodka laced 'Martini'.
History: Created in 2002 by Henry Besant at The Lonsdale, London, England. Our Martini cocktail page details its evolution and other common variants.
